decisions.description: This check is in place to ensure that Salesforce doesn't add in a bug while processing lists.
decisions.name: Has_this_specialist_been_used_yet
decisions.label: Has this specialist been used yet?

decisions.description: If yes, we then remove the current specialist from the specialist list, and set the new current specialist to be the first person left in the list

recordLookups.description: Gets advice which is in fulfilment but hasn't got an update status yet
recordLookups.name: Get_advice_newly_ready
recordLookups.label: Get advice newly ready

fields.name: ongoingExplain
fields.fieldText:
Choose any advice that should not receive an update.

Selected advice will not receive a task on its household.

fields.name: blockedExplain
fields.fieldText:
Choose any advice that should now receive an update.

Selected advice will receive a task on the household.

fields.name: introText
fields.fieldText:
To assign out fulfilment updates, click Next.


You’ll be able to

- take advice off the not receiving updates list

- add new advice in fulfilment to the receiving updates list

- choose advice on the receiving updates lists to assign out

- choose the team members who will send the updates this week


Don't do this if you don't want them to get tasks yet!

fields.name: newExplain
fields.fieldText:
Choose any advice that should not start receiving updates.

﻿Selected advice will not receive a task on its household.

value.stringValue: Just to provide an update for you - I have fulfilled your request!

fields.name: doneText
fields.fieldText: Click Assign Updates to continue.

fields.name: casesExplain
fields.fieldText: Each specialist will receive a maximum of {!householdsPerSpecs} cases each.

fields.name: specialistExplain
fields.fieldText: Choose who updates should be assigned to this week.
